services.name: Buyers Inspection
services.description: Comprehensive pre-purchase inspection of every major system. Our detailed analysis gives you confidence before closing.
services.priceNote: Pricing varies based on square footage and property features
includes: Complete home inspection from roof to foundation
All major systems: HVAC, electrical, plumbing
Detailed report with photos and recommendations
Lifetime phone support at no extra charge

services.name: Pre-Sale Inspection
services.description: The Pre-Sale Inspection is you as a homeowner getting your home inspected by a licensed professional before you put it on the market. This helps you avoid delays at the end of the real estate deal. You'll know what's wrong, and you can get it fixed or make allowances for the repairs.
services.priceNote: Pricing varies based on square footage and property features
includes: Complete home inspection (same as Buyers Inspection)
Identify issues before listing your home
Get repairs done on your terms
Increase buyer confidence and avoid delays
Lifetime phone support at no extra charge

services.name: Thermal Imaging (Infrared Scan)
services.description: Thermal Imaging is used to further verify moisture in bathrooms, under sinks, and ceilings. The thermal scan can also show you breakers in a panel box that's possibly overloaded as well as radiant heat in flooring. If you have concerns with water stains on ceilings or in and around toilets, this is a service you want to consider.
includes: Moisture detection in bathrooms and under sinks

services.name: Sewer Scope Inspection
services.description: A main sewer line inspection from the sewer cleanout of the house to the city sewer manhole or the home's septic tank. This video inspection can reveal tree roots growing in your sewer pipe, grease collecting in the line, debris buildup, and even kids' toys that went missing. We recommend this add-on service - it's always good to know if you have any issues with the main sewer line BEFORE YOU BUY.
includes: Video inspection from cleanout to connection

services.name: Radon Testing
services.description: If you are living or buying a home in Arkansas that borders Missouri, you should consider getting your home tested for radon. Radon is a naturally-occurring radioactive gas that can cause lung cancer and is the second leading cause of lung cancer in the United States. This test requires a minimum of 48 hours to complete. We are IAC2 Certified in Radon.

services.name: Mold Inspection & Sampling
services.description: We are IAC2 Mold Certified and can take samples of areas of concern and have them properly tested at a professional certified lab. Mold affects everyone differently, with people with allergies/asthma being affected more. If you suspect you're smelling mold or seeing visible signs on walls, ceilings, and window sills, you need to get it inspected. If the suspected mold area is greater than 9 sq. ft. (3'x3'), DON'T TRY TO REMEDIATE IT YOURSELF - CALL A PROFESSIONAL.
includes: Areas larger than 9 sq ft require professional help

services.name: Septic Load and Dye Test
services.description: A septic load and dye test assesses the condition and capacity of a septic system. A colored dye is introduced into the plumbing system to trace water flow from entry to the drain field. The load test intentionally floods the system with large volumes of water to evaluate its ability to handle heavy loads. This is essential due diligence when buying or selling a property with a septic system.
services.priceNote: Essential for properties with septic systems

services.name: Methamphetamine Residue Sampling
services.description: Testing for methamphetamine in rental properties protects health, avoids legal liabilities, and maintains property value. Meth is highly toxic and can cause serious health risks, property damage, and legal issues. As a landlord, you have a legal responsibility to ensure your rental property is safe and free from hazardous substances. We recommend testing regularly, especially before and after tenant moves.

services.name: AR Insurance Inspection
services.description: AR Insurance Inspection is an extension of Cherokee Home Inspection LLC. We provide both 4-Point Insurance Inspections and Pre-Insurance Inspections. These services help ensure your property meets insurance requirements and can assist in securing favorable coverage. Often required by insurance companies to gauge risks associated with insuring the property.
includes: Roof: Assessment of condition, material, age, and damage
Electrical Systems: Panel, wiring, outlets, and switches inspection
Plumbing System: Leaks, pipe condition, water heater status
HVAC System: Heating, ventilation, and AC condition and efficiency
Detailed inspection report for insurance company

services.name: AR Mold Inspection
services.description: At AR Mold Inspection, a subsidiary of Cherokee Home Inspection LLC, we specialize in mold inspection and indoor air quality testing. Our team of IAC2-certified professionals utilizes visual inspections, thermal imaging, and moisture meters to identify potential mold-causing issues in your home. We collect samples of suspected mold growth and collaborate with our preferred certified laboratory for analysis.
services.priceNote: Lab analysis and comprehensive results included
includes: Sample collection of suspected mold growth
